Self.Wiki: This map object represents a part within the map.

SibPath.Wiki: A path to a .sib file, presumed to be some kind of editor placeholder.

ModelName.Wiki: The model of the map object, corresponding to an entry in the ModelParam.

Rotation.Wiki: Rotation of the map object, in degrees.

Scale.Wiki: Scale of the map object, only meaningful for map pieces and objects.

MapStudioLayer.Wiki: A bitmask that determines which ceremonies the part appears in.

DrawGroups.Wiki: Controls when the map object is visible.

DispGroups.Wiki: Controls when the map object is visible.

BackreadGroups.Wiki: Controls when the map object is loaded.

EntityID.Wiki: Identifies the map object in event scripts.

EntityGroups.Wiki: The entity ID group this map object belongs to.

LanternID.Wiki: The light parameters to use for the lantern when this map object is touched by the player.

LodParamID.Wiki: The level of detail parameters to use when this map object is visible to the player.

PointLightShadowSource.Wiki: Is this map object to be considered a point light shadow source.

ShadowSource.Wiki: Is this map object to be considered a shadow source.

ShadowDest.Wiki: Is this map object to be considered a shadow destination.

IsShadowOnly.Wiki: Is this map object only rendered when calculating the shadow pass.

DrawByReflectCam.Wiki: Is this map object drawn by the reflection camera.

DrawOnlyReflectCam.AltName: Is Only Drawn by Reflection Camera
DrawOnlyReflectCam.Wiki: Is this map object only drawn within the reflection camera.

LightSetID.Wiki: The ID of the value set from LightSet ParamEditor to use.

FogParamID.Wiki: The ID of the value set from FogParamEditor to use.

LightScatteringID.Wiki: The ID of the value set from LightScattering : ParamEditor to use.

EnvMapID.Wiki: The ID of the value set from Env Map:Editor to use.

ShadowParamID.Wiki: The ID of the value set from this GPARAM field to use.

DofGlareQualityID.Wiki: The ID of the value set from this GPARAM field to use.

ToneMapID.Wiki: The ID of the value set from this GPARAM field to use.

DofID.Wiki: The ID of the value set from this GPARAM field to use.

BloomID.Wiki: The ID of the value set from this GPARAM field to use.

ColorGradingID.Wiki: The ID of the value set from this GPARAM field to use.

FeedbackBlurID.Wiki: The ID of the value set from this GPARAM field to use.

MotionBlurID.Wiki: The ID of the value set from this GPARAM field to use.

AntiAliasID.Wiki: The ID of the value set from this GPARAM field to use.

SSAO_ID.Wiki: The ID of the value set from this GPARAM field to use.

LightShaftID.Wiki: The ID of the value set from this GPARAM field to use.

EventIDs.Wiki: The event ID for this part.

TransitionTime.Wiki: Amount of time it takes for GParam to transition (in seconds). -1 = default time.
